thread.title: Energy Chief: US Has Ability to Monitor Iran Nuclear Program
thread.title_full: Energy Chief: US Has Ability to Monitor Iran Nuclear Program

title: Energy Chief: US Has Ability to Monitor Iran Nuclear Program
text:
31 Energy Chief: US Has Ability to Monitor Iran Nuclear Program 
ABC News: The U.S. Energy Department has extensive technical expertise that will help verify whether Iran is complying with its commitment to limit its nuclear program under an international agreement, the U.S. energy secretary said Monday in Colorado.
